meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Maitland John Kimball Matt Noble Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6630.

td.p: Eric Maitland, a telecommunications supply attendant from San Diego, California
John Kimball, a software consultant from Parkville, Missouri
Matt Noble, a math professor originally from Mobile, Alabama (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,390)

tr.td: HAVING FUN AROUND THE WORLD
WEIRD HISTORY
"U" KNOW IT
I HAVE A PARTICULAR SET OF SKILLS
A NIGHTMARE FOR PEOPLE LIKE YOU
LIAM NEESON

tr.td: Matt
John
Eric
APOLLO 11
YOU SIX-Y THING
AUTHORS: BORN & DIED
A CASE OF A_D_D
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with an "A", and then there'll be some "D"'s in there, separated.)
TV TIME
VIOLIN MUSIC
